name: Becton, Dickinson and Company
description: Becton, Dickinson and Company (BD) is a global leader in medical technology, dedicated to advancing the world of health by improving medical discovery, diagnostics, and the delivery of care. Founded in 1897 and headquartered in Franklin Lakes, New Jersey, BD operates in more than 50 countries and has a rich history of innovation in the healthcare sector. The company is renowned for its commitment to enhancing the safety and efficacy of healthcare through a wide range of medical devices, instrument systems, and reagents. BD's product portfolio includes syringes, needles, catheters, and diagnostic systems that play a crucial role in the prevention and treatment of diseases. The company emphasizes its dedication to sustainability and social responsibility, striving to achieve significant milestones in improving global health access. Through its innovative solutions, BD aims to address critical challenges in patient safety, infection prevention, and the quality of healthcare delivery. With a focus on research and development, BD continues to introduce cutting-edge technologies and solutions that meet the evolving needs of healthcare providers and patients alike. As a trusted partner in healthcare, BD contributes to the advancement of medical science and the overall improvement of patient outcomes worldwide.
